content.detailedDescription:
The object flew quietly and high, if it is an orbital object, then its speed is like that of a satellite.

verified, the satellites were not on the given trajectory at this moment, unless it is a spy satellite.

the object flew from horizon to horizon, from west to east.
content.summary: A bright object flew early in the morning over the urals

content.detailedDescription: I was in the backyard having a cigarette with my girlfriend looking up at the night sky.Suddenly a bright light appeared in the ne sky and quickly streaked to the north for a split second and then disappeared. we both took notice and wondered what it was. we continued to look in the same area of the sky discussing what it might have been. after about 15 seconds it appeared again in the same spot it had disappeared the first time. the light again streaked to the north, this time for a full second and again went dark.We both saw the same thing and it did not act like a falling star or comet. it was the brightest thing in the sky and moved very very fast. many times faster than any plane. it was clearly the same object both times as it followed the exact same path after a brief moment of not moving/going dark and then picking up again. it gave me a bit of a chill because nothing is that bright or moves that fast. especially with the two burst/streaks. nothing like i've seen before and i am convinced it was not a falling star because i've seen them before, and not a meteor because they do not stop and start again from the same place in the sky or turn off an on.
content.summary: Watching the sky, a very bright light appeared and streaked across the sky briefly and then went dark. approximately 15 seconds passed and it again lit up in the same area it had stopped previously and again briefly streaked across the sky and went dark a

content.detailedDescription: We were driving back from ruiodoso. and the bright white light flashing caught my attention it was a distance away but as we approach it, it remained in the same spot and i turned back and the one flashing object broke up in to three different orbs and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fast

content.detailedDescription:
I wish to state that my mom and myself witnessed this separately on st. patrick's night but neither of us drink alcohol nor had taken any medications.  we had run errands during day/evening and stopped to eat before taking mom home.  i approached and stopped at the stop sign on mom's block after dropping her off at home about 9:30 pm.  i looked to my east and noticed a very bright fully illuminated orange orb/sphere about the size of a large beach ball about 300-500 feet above street level and about a block away.  my first thought was is it a helicopter but the light was orange not red/white.  i lowered my window and there was no noise.  the sphere continued toward my mom's house and neigbor's house in back and then completely disappeared (may have witnessed this for about 10 seconds).  i was in the process of backing my car back up to my mom's driveway when it disappeared never seeing the light waiver or blink out.  i went to get mom and we watched outside for 10 minutes and didn't see the orb again so i went home.  i know this was not a plane, helicopter, chines lantern, drone or a balloon.  the night was clear with no clouds in sight, no wind and good visibility of the starfield and planes flying very high overhead.  i've never seen an orange light/sphere like this before and have no idea what it was.

mom forgot to bring her snailmail out with us earlier.  about an hour later mom left to drop her bills off at the post office around 10:25 pm.  as she approached the same stop sign and looked off to her east she witnessed the orange orb/sphere further off above the treeline and stated it was also heading north and just disappeared after a few seconds. she also lowered her window to listen and never heard a sound.  she then phoned me to report she had just witnessed the exact same thing i did the hour earlier but stated it seemed to be a few blocks further off.  she also feels that this is not a plane, drone, etc.  she doesn't know what it is either.
content.summary: Very bright orange orb/sphere flying level above treeline

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I went to let my dog out and since i've seen a ufo before i decided to look for one and i saw a massive 300ft wide wedge shaped triangle craft. it stuck out as the lights flashed and in a pattern where the light furthest from the apex flashed twice and then the other three flashed from the opposite side towards the first light in individual flashes and it does so for three cycles and repeates.When i saw it, it was an obvious ufo portraying silence at an altitude around 1000ft and a non-symmetric light pattern.The craft flew in from west and was on a curved path flying towards the east and then towards the north and flew at around 100mph (too slow for such a massive object) out over the football stadium.My reaction was that i finally got to see a triangle craft and a rare one at that. i lost sight of it as it lazily listed of the horizon (the football stadium).
content.summary: Large massive oblong triangle containing 4 lights on brighter than the others

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car alone outside my house. i noticed a large orange red ball of light appear in the sky across the street behind the trees. i get out of my car run in the street. the large ball flys over across street toward my yard over the woods beyond my house then behind the trees. i did not know what it was. it was large bright and didn't have a tail. i tried to take a video.  i thought i was recording.  i hade plenty of time to get a good shot. i zoomed in and everything but when i went to watch it is only had one second of recording.  i was shaking because i had never seen anything like this in my life. i could have hit record twice i guess.  i realized it wasn't recording and did get the flashes of light as it flew behind the trees but you really can't see anything.
content.summary: Large orange red ball of light slowly appeared from behind the tree line. flew over me across the street and behind the other tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
Was wawiting for friend to finish plasma, saw this fake plane turn into a spinning hexagonal saturn looking thing, spin, sit stationary, then tried to blot sun by using the "blue " screen on windshield, and noticed the hex/staturn thing was emitting light from center that was pulsing.
then, it blinked in out of space and black heli's came from all directions! it disappeared, but everyone was still wondering if the white would, it statyed, and stayed, and never really moved much it seemed,. was still around later in evening, only larger, red, and further east
content.summary: Weird fake plane turns to spinning hexagon, then a large planetary white orb by sun gov heli's

content.detailedDescription: I was on a united airlines flight from lax to smf. i was continuously looking out the window to view the landscape below. when we came upon a flat cloud cover i was looking down upon. not able to the landscape i started observing the clouds. for as far as i could see it appeared to have such an even top surface. i thought there must be an altitude reason for that. then came up on a tall cone like blast that went up out of the flat surface. as if something came up out of the clouds at that spot and took some clouds with it for a ways. looked very odd. i then began to be more observant. we then came up on what looked like a circle like cloud. didnt seem normal either. i was staring at it when i saw this rod like cloudy thing appear out of nowhere. it started to get larger. it then started to move like a snake, it had motions on both side. i nudged the next to me, and said you have to see this. he said its looks like a rocket. then it stopped and moved like a snake. i felt sure that this thing had intelligent motions as if it was alive. lost sight by passing it by.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Started as nothing, grew to a straight pole like object then turned into a snake like cload

content.detailedDescription: I went outside, i noticed a weird lead/gray thing spinning in sky, took pic, then nticed a big new planet in background, wtf. and another something in sky.
content.summary: Outside, noticed a hexagon/polygon in sky, noticed a huge planet/sun, noticed wtf

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside taking a piss,my girls using the bathroom at the time, off the back deck and i spotted an incredible bright star in the sky, about 9pm at night west of springfield mo witch i've never seen anything like in my entire life. i yelled out to the family to come out and watch. we all pulled up chairs to watch this wonderful event. it lasted about 30 min more or less. it sparkled and seemed to play tricks on my eyes because the light expelled, to me, multiple colors like that of the rainbow. truthfully i thought it was possibly mars reflecting sunlight of it's surface because the star was so large. but i don't know if mars was even that close to earth at that time.
  maybe you can explain to me what happened that night several weeks ago. 
  i've been in touch with you before about a silver disk flying over my car when i was living in pennsylvania that happened near philadelphia where i lived back 2 or 3 decades ago. so you must have me listed some where in your records i'm sure. 
 this all happened in feb 2017. please contact me by phone or email, leave a message if by phone i would look forward to hear from you.

                                            thank you very much
                                            gordon h.
content.summary: This was like the brightest star in the sky sparkling 100 times brighter than any star in the sky the whole family sat on the back porch watching this incredible site i've never seen anything like this.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to let my dog do his business and i always like to look up at the sky. when i looked around i saw five orbs in the sky fairly far away. they were like a reddish color, also in a v shape but sideways and the point was facing in the direction they were moving. i followed them with my eyes until trees and house wouldn't let me see them. they were going way faster than any airplane i have ever seen. and there was not a sound coming from them.
content.summary: It was at night, i had to walk my dog and looked up in the sky and saw the ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work. noticed how large and bright the moon was so i stopped and took a picture of it with my cell phone and drove home. after looking closer at the photo, i noticed an object to the left of the moon. i didn't see any airplanes in the area so i had no clue what it was.
content.summary: Object to the left of the moon

content.detailedDescription: Le soir du 27 février 2017 vers 18:50hrs. en direction sud, sud-est une lumière brillante qui n'a pas habitude de se trouver la, on aurait dit à première vue vénus mais je venais de voir vénus sur le devant de la maison mais la je me trouvais sur le côté de la maison, et elle était d'une brillance semblable. et en l'espace de 5 à 10 secondes elle s'est mise à monter dans le ciel à une vitesse inimaginable. aucune avions ni même la station spatiale que l'on peut voir à l'œil nu, ne va aussi vite. la luminosité s'affaiblissait au fur et à mesure qu'elle montait, jusqu'au moment ou je ne voyait plus rien. j'ai pris les jumelles pour m'assurer qu'il n'y avait pas de nuage, et je voyais très bien les autres étoiles qu'on ne voit qu'avec des jumelles. donc ce ne peut-être une illusion d'optique causé pas un plafond nuageux. après avoir vérifier avec mes jumelles qu'il n'y avait pas de nuage et avoir vérifier quand et à qu'elle endroit que la station spatial passait, je me suis dit que je venais de voir un ovni quitter la terre. et ce n'est pas la première fois que je vois de ces phénomènes...Photos à l'appuis !
content.summary: Lumière stationnaire brillante, puis ascension fulgurate

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv at 12:36 am on october 7th when i had a metaphysical feeling to go outside on to the balcony.  as i entered the balcony i had seen what had look like a plane downing in the fields in the southwest of my viewing direction.  the object had two brilliant lights that were blinding as the object changed directions and headed directly towards my viewing angle.  as the object came near it appeared to be shadowed by two brilliant white lights cloaking the object. at this point i had raised my left arm to shield off the light and the object now around 150 ft from me appeared a huge black triangular craft 45-50 yards equalaterally.  the triangle had a center circular dome pertruding from the center of the triangle with a glowing green center that could have been an energy source.  the bottom surface of the triangle was a smooth titanium bottom with 3 to 4 green red and blue blinking lights in a random blinking sequence.  the triangular craft had a 45 degree angle rise to the top with a mesh looking side almost like bent metal with wiring.  the triangle made no noise or engine admittance, as it hoovered in front of me for around a minute and a half before hoovering away at such slow speeds away over the tree line.  afterwards it had a major psychological impact on me.  for the next six months when i slept i had been on different planets and viewed different technologies. at times i would have to survive on these planets but drinking serums to survive and wakening and spuing a fowl taste on to my pillow. this happend at least 30 times,  at times i was sent to mystical magical places of myth with exotic mix breeds of animals ad vegatation.  i had some time waked and stood still and felt an intense vibration in my ear it was so intense it would sound like won won won won won won, and as soon as i would move an intense pulse of energy would be admitted to the refrigerated with an electrical booming sound.  this no longer goes on with me after i moved out of monroe, however these were a real reality of amazing, enlightning, intelligent experience that also was sometimes horrific and terrorfying.  i believe that at times these events could have been related to a recurring abduction.  the spewing of the fowl liquid that i spewed would always happen when i woke, it seems as if i was entering a decontamintation before i woke.  also relavant was the presence of a contuning taste of swallowing grass and fowl tasting serums?  hope you enjoyed this experience i felt like this should be shared with others?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White cloaking triangular ufo 150ft hovering soundless

content.detailedDescription: On march 16th, 2017 at 9:15 pm while looking at the night sky from my south facing deck, i witnessed a randomly flashing bluish/white light that appeared to be at high altitude. i had been looking at a jets navigation lights at altitude. i first noticed the flashes just behind the jet. at first i thought it had had an explosion or problem. the object was not following the jet. the flashes were sometimes as bright as a high powered led or laser being pointed directly at me. other times very dim. the time between flashes was random,as long as ten seconds or as short as three seconds. it tracked from north to south. before going into the shadow of the earth a "spur" or red light, maybe fire came from the 7-8 o'clock area of the light. it was several times the width of the light itself. the total time i saw it was about 6-7 minutes. i am certain it was not an aircraft.
content.summary: Flashing blue/white light

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed. as i was laying down my husband asked me "what is that noise?" i did not hear the noise until a couple minutes later. the best way i can describe it is like a transformer at a power plant, it was a noise but i could feel it too. it made me feel very anxious and overwhelmed with emotions. i paced the living room in circles. then just as it came it slowly faded away, i couldn't go to sleep.
content.summary: Heard loud humming noise above house at 2:30 am. made me feel very anxious and panicked. couldn't sleep. felt like i was full of energy after. then it left.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub after work, enjoying a beer, which is my normal routine, on this warmer than normal spring night. i just happened to glance to the north and noticed a solitary dull white light moving in a due south path. i only observed the light for approximately 4 seconds before it went out. it's speed seemed faster than i would consider an aircraft to be going, but not streaking across the sky. there were some broken thin wispy clouds over casper at the time and the moon was somewhat illuminating them. nothing so thick that it would conceal the light. there were no strobe lights of any color adjacent to this single white light. i continued to watch the assumed flight path with no sign of the white light, outline of an aircraft, no strobes and no sound. it vanished. my guess at an altitude would be around 20000 feet.
content.summary: Observed a solitary white light, no green or red strobe, in the due north sky, flying in a due south path

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my friends house this past summer, in missoula montana, listening to music, and i saw a very fast moving yellow/gold/white light. i first noticed the light because i was looking at the stars and saw movement, at first i thought it was a shooting star because of the light and trail. i called my friends attention to it. the light then descended rapidly, then changed direction 4 times before vanishing with some kind of warp drive, leaving behind a glowing trail of light in the sky! at first i we were astonished and in disbelief, then i became excited and i wanted to tell people, i only told 3 friends because i didn't think people would believe me. i lost sight of the object when it covered an incredible distance leaving behind a glowing trail vanishing beyond the horizon. i have seen planes, shooting stars, comets and satellites, i have never seen anything move like this, neither has my friend. my friend was a non-believer until this happened. i just want to know if anyone else saw this.
content.summary: Light in the night sky, as far away as a star, moved incredibly fast, changed direction multiple times before it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
march 16, 2017



to mufon,

     i tried to submit my story a little earlier today. but i accidently clicked a wrong button on my computer, then tried to click back to this page to submit my story. when i clicked back to this page my story wasn't there. i don't know if you got my story the first time i tried to submit it. i am typing sending my story again.
     i have for years wanted to tell my story,but didn't know where to. i lived with my father, mother, two brothers, and sister in kansas city, kansas where i grew up. my mothers parents and relatives lived in and around boonville and pilot grove, missouri. we often went there. i loved going there to the country, to get out of the city, a big city kansas city, kansas. my mother often left me there with different relatives of hers. i didn't mind at all. i wished we lived in boonville.
     it was about 1965 give or take a year. i was about eight more or less. my mother left me at her aunt and uncles in boonville. her aunt and uncle had a house and gas station on about six to ten acres in boonville, missouri. my grandmother, my mothers mother, had a trailer house on my mothers aunt and uncles place, and my mothers aunt and uncles daughter and her husband also had a trailer house on this place. again it was about 1965 and i was about eight years old. i stayed with my grandmother in her trailer house about a week. 
     i caught a baby cottontail rabbit. not having a cage i found a large piece of screen wire  i shaped , and i put the screen wire over the rabbit under my grandmothers trailer house. when i came back, the rabbit was gone had gotten away. a day or two later my dad said at the farm behind the place (behind my mothers aunt and uncles place) there was a lot of rabbits under a brush pile. i don't know why my father was at that farm or how he seemed to know i wanted a rabbit. 
     any way the next day i woke up everyone was gone. i decided to go to the farm out back to try to catch another rabbit. the rabbit that got away i caught in my grandmothers yard, not at that farm. i walked back past my mothers aunt and uncles house, and back past a large old garage. sometimes there was men seemingly working in that old garage. i don't know if they were working on cars or what. they never paid any mind to me. then i walked across a gravel road to the farm, a pasture. the farm house was a ways away to my left. right away i saw two baby rabbits. i walked toward them and they went in the brush pile, dried sticks and dried brush. i looked into the brushpile couldn't see the rabbits. but, a ways in front of me i saw a small barn with a wooden fence and about five black minature goats. i went and petted the goats. then to the left of me in the pasture i saw about five sheep. i wanted to pet the sheep. i'd get within about fifthteen feet of the sheep and they'd run away. i stopped. they stopped. i tried again to walk toward them. they run off. i stopped. then i saw a barb wire fence and a cow. to think i wandered around farms without permission of the owner. i was just a kid then. beyond the barb wire fence was woods. i walked over to the barb wire fence. the cow was standing by the fence about thirty feet to my right. i wanted to go over the fence into the woods. i grew up little up in woods in missouri, and we hunted morel mushrooms in woods from missouri to kansas. i was good at going over, under and through barb wire fences. i liked the outdoors. the trees and brush were thick. i could see about fifthteen to twenty feet into the woods, and see the woods sloped down. but, something wouldn't let me go over the barb wire fence. something told me not to. this wasn't like me. so i stood there a few minutes by the fence. all of a sudden birds in a tree to the left of me startled took off flew away fast. then next the cow about thirty feet to the right of me suddenly startled took off running away. i was a bit concerned, but i also knew animals can startle over any little thing. then i heard a humming noise coming out of the woods. a smooth constant humming noise. i stood there listened to it for about fifthteen seconds. my first thought in the first few second, my mind trying to figure out what i was hearing, was it was a truck on a highway. then i thought no, it was in the woods there, any road would be farther away. besides it didn't sound like a truck any way. then i felt scared, thought i had better get away from there. i walked back across the pasture and back to my grandmothers trailer. i never went to that farm again. i didn't tell my parents or any relatives about this. i was afraid i'd get a lecture about leaving without asking, and/ or grounded, get blamed for it, or they wouldn't believe me. the humming noise was not a car or truck, or a tractor, or plane, and the humming noise didn't sound like any machinery i ever heard, and i don't believe any such was in the woods any way. i'd guess the humming noise was about one hundred to maybe one hundred and fifty to two hundred feet from me. that the birds flew away and then the cow run away before the humming noise started. the birds were in trees had a better view then i did of the woods. and the cow, i think some animals have better hearing then people. it just occured to me, whoever was in the woods and what ever they were, did not want me to come in the woods, and didn't want me there. was the humming sound coming from the woods to warn me to stay away? it worked, i got away from there quick, walked away quickly. if so it was nice of them who ever they were, to warn me to get away from there.If someone whoever they were didnt want me in those woods? or if there was  danger in the woods, snakes,or perhaps a mean cow or bull or other animal, and the humming noise was a warning to stay out of those woods? no the humming noise was not an insect or bee or snake. i didn't hear any noise in the woods, like dry sticks and stuff snapping or being stepped on. just silence in the woods, accept for the humming noise.
     many years ago my uncle, my mothers brother, who lived in the boonville-pilot grove area in missouri, he told me he had seen a ufo. in 2003 when i was in missouri he showed me an old newspaper clipping he saved about him seeing a ufo. i dont remember what year he saw it, i think before 1980. he passed away a few years ago.
     in the late 1960's we went to my mothers fathers, my grandfathers, farm near boonville and pilot grove, missouri. at about 9 to 10 pm we went around the bend around the alfalfa field to his driveway, and got out of the car. it was dark. my grandfather was sitting outside in the front yard under the chinese elm tree. i walked over by him. he asked me" do you see the ufo's?" his exact words. i said no, where? he pointed in the dark to across the alfalfa field and across the road to woods. i looked still didn't see any thing. again i asked him where? he pointed to the same area. i tried to look real hard, strained squinted my eyes hard to see in the dark. still i couldn't really see anything, except i saw a tiny red light and that could have been from straining, squinting my eyes so hard in the dark to see. but, i told him yes i see them because i didn't want to offend him, and so he'd quit asking me if i saw them. i believed him. just because i couldn't see it in the dark, didn't mean he couldn't see it. besides i don't think he'd make something like that up. he was a farmer. but, why he told me, and not my parents, unless he told them later. and my parents, brothers, sister , me , had just drove around that bend, the bend by the woods, then to my grandfathers driveway, and we got out of the car. next my grandfather asked me if i saw the ufo's, and he pointed to the woods by the bend. it did urk me thinking that if we, my parents, my brothers, sister, me, had just drove right by, that close, to ufo's and didnt even notice it. in 1975 my mother showed me some pictures she had recently taken of a circle in the grass on my grandfathers farm in boonville-pilot grove area, missouri. my mother said, my grandfather, her father, had taken her shown her the circle in the grass on his farm. i asked her if it could be from a huge round metal pig feeder. she said no. now that i think about it, i only saw that huge round metal pig feeder on his farm a couple of years  when i was a kid. i believe he may have sold or got rid of it years before 1975. about four or five years ago i asked my mother if she still had that picture of the circle in the grass. she said she didn't know. she gave a lot of pictures to all us kids, so one of my brothers or sister may have got that picture, or the picture is lost. i even tried in 2013 went to her house looked with her through all her picture albums, didnt find that picture. i saw many pictures had been removed from her picture albums. probably from her giving all of us kids pictures. or some of her pictures got mislaid or lost. she passed away last summer. 
     here is a briefer story. it was in the early 1970's in kansas city, kansas where i grew up. i was about thriteen to fifthteen. a friend my age and i went outside in my backyard. it was dark about 10pm, we sat on the swingset, talking. all the sudden bam a white round flat light about twenty inches across and about fourty feet more or less above us lite up. it lite up the area of the swingset. there was no noise, silence. she and i both screamed at the same time, got off the swing set, walked across the backyard to the back door, went in the house. neither one of us ever said one thing about it to each other or any one else. i think because we were kids and shocked by it, too paralized with fear, terror, to even say a thing about it. about mid  1960's her mother said they were driving one night in missouri and saw a ufo. that's about all her mother said about it. i don't believe her mother would make that up. they had relatives in missouri too.  
     all i have written here is what i saw and heard. what i've written here truthfully what others saw, or told me they saw. i have no reason to make any of this up. i don't see or hear things that aren't there. i wish i hadnt heard or seen these things. and any people i've mentioned above who told me about or saw these things, i believe them and i see no reason they would make such things up. and i know what i saw and heard.
     another story. in 1978 or 1979 my son four and i were staying with my dad in his trailer in kansas city, kansas near the kansas river. one afternoon me and my son four went for a walk down the road. woods to our right and an open field to the left, a ways down the road. i saw three red lights flying in a triangle formation over the field. there was nothing between the red lights except the sky. the red lights were spaced out over an area about the size of a football field, and i am not sure how many feet up in the sky. the three red lights flew over us, not going real fast, the lights seemed to slow down a little when directly above us, then picked a little speed same as before they slowed down, and i watched untill the lights flew out of sight to the right of me. what else was i to do, there we were, no one else around. it was shocking and unexpected. i stopped,stood still watching to see what it was doing to do, wasn't much else i could do. we went back to the trailer. a fews days later when i went to the grocery store i bought a midnight globe paper. this was in 1978 or 1979. sitting down at the kitchen table in the trailer i read some pages. a story on the next page caught my attention ufo's seen over concordia, kansas, a ufo three lights flying in a triangle formation, shooting different color lights. concordia was west of or some ways from kansas city, kansas. it was what i saw three lights flying in a triangle. only i didn't see the lights shooting different colors of lights. my dad was sitting in the front room. only after i saw it in a paper did i tell him about seeing three red lights flying in a triangle down the road. he told me the the woman at the tollgate said she had seen ufo's flying around at night at the river. i highly assume it was the kansas river. i will allways wonder what i saw, if it was a stunt by midnight globe paper, if so how they did it. or if it wasn't a stunt. 
     it'd be best to contact me by email first. i'll try to check my email once a day. if you call, and your call shows up on my phone caller id as just a number and no name, i could mistake your call for a telemarketer call not answer my phone. sincerely, linda miller
content.summary: Birds in a tree suddenly startled flew away and a cow suddenly ran away. then i heard a humming sound coming out of the woods.

content.detailedDescription:
At northbound stop light in lincoln, ca - observed cylindrical object moving from to ne to the nw at very high rate of speed.  object seemed to be bus size - maybe 1000 - 1200 feet up.  object crossed 60% of our horizon in approx 8 seconds.  my wife and i both observed the object - she thought it might be a drone, but we didn't see any type of propulsion.

we've lived on numerous air force bases and are familiar with most aircraft.
content.summary: Cylindrical silver object moving very fast across 60 % of the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after 9 p.M. i was walking westward on the northwest side of chicago. in the southwestern sky, at about 45 degrees, i suddenly saw a large oval ball of blue-white light in the distance many, many miles away. it appeared suddenly, quickly descended angling slightly northward but falling almost directly downward. at about 30 degrees it completely disappeared leaving no trace. i searched the same general area of the sky for several minutes afterward and saw nothing more.
content.summary: Large ball of light appeared suddenly, descended quickly and disappeared in sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving. bright light and change of direction and hovering. it was unusual and nothing like i have ever seen. during; concerned, and watched them for hours. after, concerned, worried, afraid. they went off into different directions and up into the sky farther than the ye can see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I witnessed many sightings from march 9- march 15. and possibly tonight(march 16)

content.detailedDescription: Driving. bright light and change of direction and hovering. it was unusual and nothing like i have ever seen. during; concerned, and watched them for hours. after, concerned, worried, afraid. they went off into different directions and up into the sky farther than the ye can see.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I witnessed many sightings from march 9- march 15. and possibly tonight(march 16)

content.detailedDescription: Turned  off just past gin gin heading to monto driving to the west when myself and father observed 2 disc shaped black/dark grey ufos hovering around 40meters apart approximately 150meters high in the air.
content.summary: Two disc shaped ufos

content.detailedDescription:
I was a small child 6 or 7 and i vividly remember a "dream" i had,
it was summer i was sleeping nude , my day bed facing the bedroom doorway.
sleeping on my back i had a "dream" that i woke up to a presence in my room, in the "dream" i then lifted my head to see 3 very tall ,grey aliens, the outlines of their bodies were almost transparent like they just floated through door frame. big big black eyes. i wasnt scared or anything in my dream i was almost blank.... the three stood over me 2 at the left side of my bed and one at the foot, the one nearest on the left leaning in. they did something seemingly to my abdominal/private area but i felt no pain and just watched them almost paralyzed. and that was it!

this "dream" has stuck with me through the years and is very vivid. but what is most odd to me is that my mind classifies this as a dream but why as a child would i dream of waking up to a presence in the room?
content.summary: "dream" of 3 aliens

content.detailedDescription: I was on my phone looking at google earth images in antarctica where i found this remarkabley out of place disk sitting atop a large mountain near but not in, the queen maud mountains in antarctica. that particular range is completely blurred out.. the object casts shadow following it's perfect contours.This is obviously a smooth possibly metallic object displaying remarkable symmetry and detail for a satilite image. notice the setting sun (as much as it sets in antarctica) reflecting just off of the dome (located in the exact center of the object), and the paneling sunward.
content.summary: Antarctic disk landed - satilite imahe

content.detailedDescription: At 10.32am i went to open my bed room window as it was a nice day. i was looking out of the window and i had noticed a bright object with contrails moving in the east. the object was moving at a fast speed and it had no sound. it was a disc shaped object. so i got camera tooken a photo of the object.
content.summary: At 10.32am i went to open my bed room window as it was a nice day. i was looking out of the window. i had noticed a bright object with contrails it looked strange. so i got my camera i tooken a picture of a disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
On 12th floor balcony in between dto. domingo and la romana of the island  dominican republic. saw something very bright in the sky, grabbed
my camera and starting taking pictures.  that's the blue one shaped like letter n.  the other 2 pictures were taken in tulum mexico on beach at night.
i don't share these pictures with anyone, except for mufon. i juts thought you would like these pictures.  do you have any pictures of real aliens you can send me . would love to see one.
content.summary: Bright light mostly neon blue shape of letter n/ other picture different lights snake looking squiggly/ other one bright white all taken different locations

content.detailedDescription: Coming out of apts by graham park noticed low fling missel like structure flying slowly from south to west about twenty five dgrees above east horizon,no noise no visible heat propulsion in aft,had many anttena like appendages around circumference,appeared to be some survellance apparatus.
content.summary: Missel shaped craf blue nose con black stripe in aft antenna appendages around circumference

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
The night before the last wednesday of each iranian new year, the country celebrates with bonfires, fireworks and lit balloons. on this day in 2016, i saw a constant stream of glowing flying objects travel across the sky, but only during the duration of this festivity, once the fireworks etc. started the objects starting arriving and once the fireworks etc. had finished, there were no more flying objects. this was the first time i had been in this location on this specific night in 2016. i reported the sightings of 2016 to mufon.

exactly the same night, exactly the same thing has happened this year (2017). watching, everything was the same as 2016. glowing yellow balls all travelled from one direction to another and appeared to follow the same path and destination. every few minutes one would appear from as far right out of my window i could see and travel right across the sky to the left (as far as i could see).Watching with binoculars (cheap, not very strong ones) the objects could accelerate and slow down easily and could move up and down and hover and move in any direction without any difficulties. the ones that passed nearby appeared to have a light shining (like a torch light type of thing).

there were fireworks going off but from the many videos i took, you can see the objects were not fireworks, nor were they the fire balloons which people release in iran as part of the celebrations because looking at the travel path and how the objects were moving, it was very obvious they were craft of some description.

the fireworks night lasted about 3 hours in total and so did the flying objects - starting around 7pm and finishing around 10pm approx. there were a couple of aeroplanes i saw flying while the glowing objects were in near vicinity.

it is interesting that these glowing objects have appeared only during the fireworks night when the sky would be lit up with fireworks, small glowing lanterns and a lot of bonfires are happening in iran and the exact same thing happening in 2016, has happened in 2017.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fleet of glowing objects fly across sky for 3 hours during national fireworks night in tehran
